alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 2:26PM PST until March 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 feet above 8000 feet, and 2 to 4 feet above 6500 feet including Interstate 80. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass and Highway 50 over Echo Summit. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Reduced visibility at times due to heavy snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...We will see a break in the snow into the overnight with snow showers redeveloping Saturday morning and continuing into early Sunday. Snow levels 3000 to 4000 feet Saturday morning, rising to 5000 to 6500 feet Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
